data.content:
We’re going to a water world – so let the creativity flow!

We’re inviting kids to use their imagination and create art inspired by #EuropaClipper, our mission to Jupiter's ocean moon Europa. Submit artwork and learn more about the challenge: https://t.co/INq46g5XnR https://t.co/pzlTMBy23R

As our #Artemis II crew prepares for their historic trip around the Moon, they recently took a trek across the Icelandic landscape to build their skills in geology: https://t.co/2CI7EbfhaR https://t.co/DJGuBFxbmd

How did this Mars rock get its stripes? @NASAPersevere spotted this intriguing rock, which may have rolled down to the pebbly terrain near Jezero Crater's rim.
 
The rover's science team hopes to spot an outcrop of this new rock type on the drive uphill: https://t.co/p8Mc7KfuEx https://t.co/ZyAJoGIUwE
.@CopernicusEU #Sentinel2C took this image of the #Moon as part of the calibration of its multispectral imager. https://t.co/n0QwMsUy2e
🆕 The NASA/ESA/CSA James Webb Space Telescope has found a potential missing link to the first stars!✨https://t.co/dyV9cYEBmM
😎 Join us at the @Ecsite space group annual meeting, to meet like-minded professionals with a passion for space and network with key players in the sector. Register here 👉https://t.co/pICeo1nusC

🆕🎧 What does it take to train for the Moon?🤔

Hear from @astro_matthias in our latest #ESAExplores podcast as he shares his insights on preparing for lunar missions in #LUNA - our #MoonOnEarth

🔗https://t.co/BijuZQcc82 https://t.co/lGt66iKQqF

data.content: In nearly 70 years of spaceflight, around 10 000 satellites and rocket parts have reentered Earth's atmosphere. Yet for such an event, we still lack a clear view on what actually happens to a satellite during its fiery last moments. https://t.co/1YHfYpxvAY

data.content: LIVE NOW: Watch as cameras from outside the @Space_Station capture views of Hurricane #Helene as it approaches the Gulf Coast of Florida. https://t.co/v0vcB1YJwB

Take part in NASA's 2024 Space Apps Challenge, organized with 15 other space agencies from around the world, including the CSA! Come explore space and Earth science with #SpaceApps on Oct. 5-6. https://t.co/3mmntNwngf
